short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to help you keep focus while studying or working.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better Focus is a Chrome extension designed to help users manage their time on specific websites. Users can add websites they wish to limit their time on. Once a website is added, the extension restricts access to the website during specified hours (default is 9:00-17:00). If a user tries to access the website during the restricted hours, they are presented with a series of prompts and timesr to reconsider their decision. The questions, prompts, timers in the work hours are customizable. extension also provides a fun GIF from Giphy to lighten the mood. This extension is perfect for those who want to improve their productivity by minimizing distractions during work hours.
